schemaDescription: resume_source: string: Resume filename (from chat), URL, or local file path
is_url: boolean: Set True if resume_source is a URL to download from
is_chat_file: boolean: Set True if resume_source is uploaded to chat (default)
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: 'resume_source: str, is_url: bool=False, is_chat_file: bool=True'
